questions.question: What is the primary function of Parallel Virtual Machine (PVM) in the context of High Performance Computing (HPC)?
options: a) To provide data storage solutions
c) To network computers as a distributed parallel processor
d) To enhance the graphical processing unit (GPU) performance
questions.answer: c) To network computers as a distributed parallel processor

questions.question: What is a key feature of OpenNebula in cloud platform management?
options: a) Multi-tenant cloud-like provisioning layer on top of existing infrastructure
d) Integration with social media APIs
questions.answer: a) Multi-tenant cloud-like provisioning layer on top of existing infrastructure

questions.question: Which cloud platform mentioned in the lecture notes is known for its compatibility with Amazon Web Services (AWS) protocols?
Explain the role of the Message Passing Interface (MPI) in High Performance Computing (HPC).
questions.answer: MPI is a library used for High Performance Computing that establishes information flow between nodes and clusters, allowing programmers to focus on algorithms rather than communications overheads.

questions.question: What is the primary advantage of using the Dryad infrastructure for data-parallel programs?
questions.answer: The primary advantage of using Dryad is that it enables a programmer to utilize the resources of a computer cluster or a data center without needing to understand concurrent programming.

questions.question: Describe the Nimbus Cloud Platform and list one of its compatibility features.
questions.answer: The Nimbus Cloud Platform is an open-source Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) solution that focuses on remote deployment and lifecycle management of virtual machines (VMs). One of its compatibility features is its ability to work with Amazon Network protocols.
